subject: Re: [cc-devel] Exempi, namespaces
body:
Hi,


> I've been hacking at Tracker, using exempi-1.99.0.  It's definitely very
> handy :-)
> 
> There's one issue I've come across.  I'd like to add CC license info in
> the http://web.resource.org/cc/ namespace, but can't since it isn't a
> registered namespace.  In other words, RegisterNamespace isn't wrapped. 
> It looks like it requires the following in exempi.cpp:

I forgot that important bit for those who want to write.

Looks like I'll do a 1.99.1 for you :-)
I'll also add the const for the CC namespace (the one that Mike mentionned)

And I'll catch the exceptions more. They shouldn't even be propogated
out of the library.

Hub

PS: I'm now subscribed to the list.
